frame.name: FR_Expressing_stance
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Speaker</fen> expresses through language a personal stance as to the veracity of some <fen>True_content</fen>, the legitimacy of some <fen>Legitimate_content</fen>, or as to the advisability of performing some <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex> </ex> <asf>Relation to fndata-1.5</asf> : New in ASFALDA.
</def-root>

FE.name: Speaker
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who expresses their stance. </def-root>

FE.name: True_content
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>True_content</fen> is the content the <fen>Cognizer</fen> expresses they believe is true.</def-root>

FE.name: Legitimate_content
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Legitimate_content</fen> is the content the <fen>Cognizer</fen> expresses they believe is legitimate.</def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition: <def-root>The action whose advisability the <fen>Cognizer</fen> expresses a stance on.</def-root>
